Package com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.bindings

Classes for finding the bindings of a given Java element in the user's code.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BindingLocator The BindingLocater performs the actual determination of what an interface is bound to in a given module and where in the source code that happens.
BindingsEngine The BindingsEngine is the glue between the other objects; it is responsible for the top-level logic of the user asking the plugin to locate bindings of a java expression.
 

Package com.google.inject.tools.ideplugin.bindings Description

Classes for finding the bindings of a given Java element in the user's code.

When the user chooses the "Find Bindings" option from the Guice context menu (or any other way), a BindingsEngine object is created to handle it. The real work is done by the BindingLocator which actually uses guice to find the bindings and their locations in source code. The results, which consist of BindingCodeLocation objects are created as a CodeLocationsResults object which is then passed to the ResultsView.
